compound_name.ui:help: Give your submission a unique name that allows you to identify it
compound_name.ui:placeholder: Enter a unique name for this compound submission

other_applicants.ui:placeholder: Enter the names of any collaborators/co-applicants

data_sharing.ui:help: The PTC makes data generated by the core public by default. Please indicate if you have concerns around data sharing that you would like to discuss further.

chemical_name.ui:help: Please provide the chemical name of the compound to be tested

common_name.ui:help: Please provide the common name of the compound to be tested

CAS_number.ui:placeholder: Enter the CAS number (if available), including hyphens.
CAS_number.ui:help: CAS Numbers are 10 digits long numbers assigned to a compound as the CAS registers a new compound, and has no significance to the chemistry, structure, or chemical nature of the molecule.

compound_availability.ui:placeholder: How much compound is available for testing?
compound_availability.ui:help: Please provide in miligrams (mg) the amount of compound available for drug testing by the Preclinical Testing Core (PTC)

molecular_weight.ui:help: Please provide the molecular weight of the compound in grams per mole (g/mol).

compound_concentration.ui:title: Concentration
compound_concentration.ui:placeholder: What is the concentration of the solution?

compound_purity.ui:placeholder: Please describe the purity of the compound.

molecular_target.ui:help: Please provide the name of the molecular target of the compound (e.g. gene symbol, protein name, metabolite name).

moa_description.ui:help: Describe the pharmacological mechanism (agonist, antagonist, allosteric modulator, etc) at the molecular target.
moa_description.ui:placeholder: Please describe the mechanism of action.

therapeutic_approach.ui:help: Please describe the therapeutic approach for this compound in its intended route and formulation.

therapeutic_indication_description.ui:help: Please indicate the therapeutic indication of this compound, i.e. Abeta reduction, Tau reduction, anti-inflammatory, etc.
therapeutic_indication_description.ui:placeholder: In a few sentences, describe the therapeutic indication of this compound.

melting_point.ui:placeholder: What is the melting point (if known)?

freezing_point.ui:placeholder: What is the freezing point (if known)?

storage_temperature.ui:help: Please provide the storage conditions for the compound to minimize degridation.

water_soluble.ui:help: Please indicate if the compund is soluble in aqueous solutions.

solubility_limitations.ui:help: Please provide the solubility limitations of the compound when disolved in the ideal solvent.
solubility_limitations.ui:title: Describe any solubility limitations
solubility_limitations.ui:placeholder: In a few sentences, describe any solubility limtations of this compound.

route.ui:help: Please select the intended route of delivery fo this compound once formulated.

binding.ui:title: Cell Line-Binding
binding.ui:description: Text explaining how to add cell binding

name.ui:placeholder: Choose a unique name for this experiment

assay_description.ui:placeholder: Describe the assay used to measure binding.

binding_affinity_constant.ui:help: Please provide the inhibitory constant (Ki), which represents the binding affinity of the compound.

efficacy.ui:title: Cell Line-Efficacy
efficacy.ui:description: Text explaining how to add cell efficacy

name.ui:placeholder: Choose a unique name for this experiment

assay_description.ui:help: Please describe the efficacy assay conditions and cell lines used in the determination of the EC50/IC50 values reported above.
assay_description.ui:placeholder: Describe the assay used to measure efficacy.

outcome_measures.ui:help: Please provide the outcome measures that were used to determine the efficacy.
outcome_measures.ui:placeholder: What are the specific outcome measures?

efficacy_measure.ui:help: Please indicate the dose of the compound to achieve half maximal inhibition of the process of interest.

in_vivo_data.ui:title: In Vivo Data
in_vivo_data.ui:description: Add  In Vivo experiments here. You can click the buttons to add or remove your experiments blah blah blah

name.ui:placeholder: Choose a unique name for this experiment

species.ui:help: What species was used for this study?

strain.ui:placeholder: What strain of model was used?

outcome_measures.ui:placeholder: In a few sentences, describe the primary outcome measure

assay_description.ui:placeholder: In a few sentences, describe the assay and methods

age_range.ui:help: Please provide the age of the test subject at the time of testing.

ed50.ui:help: Please indicate the dose at which yeild 50 percent effectiveness in this study.

dose_range.ui:help: Please indicate the dose range over which you tested the compound

dose_regimen.ui:help: Please provide the dose regiment used in this study.

items.ui:placeholder: Select acute for single dose; subchronic for dosing beyond acute treatment but < 1 month)

pretreatment_time.ui:help: Provide information on pretreatment time used for this experiment
pretreatment_time.ui:placeholder: Provide information on pretreatment time used for this experiment

drug_formulation.ui:placeholder: In a few sentences, describe the compound formulation
drug_formulation.ui:help: Please provide the drug formulation for the compound of interest.

adverse_events_description.ui:placeholder: Describe any unexpected or adverse events
adverse_events_description.ui:help: Please indicate any adverse events that were observed during the study of this compound.

partition_coefficient.ui:help: Please provide the partition coefficient which is the ratio of concentrations of a compound in a mixture of two immiscible phases at equilibrium
partition_coefficient.ui:placeholder: What is the partition coefficient between aqueous and lipophilic phases

dissociation_constant.ui:help: Please provide the pKa value, which is one method used to indicate the strength of an acid.

molecular_weight.ui:help: Please provide the molecular weight of the compound in grams per mole (g/mol).
molecular_weight.ui:placeholder: What is the in silico molecular weight of the compound?

assay_description.ui:placeholder: What is the in vitro cell permeability assay to estimate BBB penetration?

permeability.ui:help: Please provide the permeability of this compound to the blood brain barrier (BBB).
permeability.ui:placeholder: In a few sentences, describe the blood brian barrier permeability of this compound.

lipophilicity.ui:help: Please provide the LogD, which is a log of partition of a chemical compound between the lipid and aqueous phases. The most popular lipid phase is octanol.
lipophilicity.ui:placeholder: What is the in vitro Drug lipophilicity coefficient?

fractional_bioavailability.ui:help: Please provide the bioavailability for the compound of interest
